attributes.action: Help Millions To Get Off Benefits By Giving Long Term Disabled People £2 Million Pounds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If we give long term disabled people who can't work about £2 million pounds into a high interest bank account they will be able to live confortable for the rest of their lives and it will cut the benefits outlay. I am Disabled person who can't work( because of severe pain 24/7) who would love to get away from the stigma of living on benefits. If I had £2 million I could buy a bungalow and live of the interest of the rest of the money for the rest of my life. It would in the long term cost less than it does to keep them on benefits.
